title: Gunmen kill 12 forest guards in Nigeria's northcentral region
description: Gunmen attacked a community in northcentral Nigeria, killing at least 12 forest guards.

title: Armed Group Attacks Nigerian Kwara Government Building, 12 Officers Killed
description: A total of 12 members of the forest guard unit were killed when a group of gunmen attacked the city of Oke-Ode in Kwara state.

title: Bandits kill 12 forest guards in north-central Nigeria, police say
description: At least 12 members of a local forest guard unit were killed when armed men attacked the town of Oke-Ode in Kwara state.

title: Gunmen kill 12 forest guards in Nigeria's northcentral region
description: Gunmen attacked a community in northcentral Nigeria, killing at least 12 forest guards according to local police.
